## Research focus

Learning and development; infant language acquisition; statistical learning; infant memory; perceptual and cognitive development.

## Academic appointments

**Assistant Professor of Psychology**, Texas A&M University–Kingsville (TAMUK), Department of Psychology and Sociology (2024–present)

**Postdoctoral Research Fellow**, University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA), Department of Linguistics (2023–2024)

**Assistant Professor of Psychology**, Uşak University, Department of Psychology (2019–2023)

**Director**, Karaman Language and Cognition Lab, Uşak University (2019–2023)
